document_data.name: Gina bint Kemala
document_data.mainbody: '''Gina bint Kemala''' was a [[human]] [[Mystic (Zakhara)|mystic]] and member of the [[Readers]] in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|29}}{{cite book/City of Delights/Golden Huzuz|55-56}}
document_data.Description: Her long black hair began to streak with grey as she approached middle age. Her sharp eyes and commanding voice instantly grabbed the attention of anyone with whom she spoke. Gina favored a turquoise blue ''[[Midani dictionary|aba]]''.
document_data.Activities:
Gina worshiped [[Zann]] and was the leader of the Readers in 1367.

She spent most of her time within the [[Mosque of Zann the Wise]], but could be found lecturing people in the public gardens. Her pursuit of mathematics often led her to hire experienced adventurers to retrieve texts from dangerous locales.
document_data.Possessions: Gina owned a ''[[ring of protection|ring of protection +3]]'', a ''[[staff of command]]'', a ''[[gem of seeing]]'', and carried a variety of magical [[scroll]]s.
